I would take a few moments to myself to process the experience and ensure I was not dreaming.
I would try to fly around my house and see if I could soar over my neighborhood.
I would explore the city from a bird's eye view and take in the sights and sounds from a unique perspective.
I would try to fly over mountains and valleys to see the natural beauty of the world from above.
I would take a trip to another country or city to experience the culture and landmarks from a bird's eye view.
